title: Diamond Support - LF ADC DUO (D4+)
body:
Reached Diamond 3 Solo Queue, currently Diamond 4.

Looking for a serious, confident AD main to reach Challenger next season/preseason as well.

I've played in numerous Challenger teams and played in the OCS quals, so my communication is of a good standard.

Voice comms is obviously a must (which program we use can be discussed later), and must be willing to communicate in and out of lane.

Add me in-game as I probably won't check this post that often.

_plzbuffsupports_
